Elita:

=E2=80=9CWill this Tai-chi will help to Windlord too?=E2=80=9Dasked=
 the little one =E2=80=9CHe had been soo moody lately=E2=80=9D

From: Sandy=
 Panico 
Sent: Wednesday, August 03, 2011 12:03 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
Subject: Re: MEdic Bay




Nightshift chuckles and helps Elita back up =
onto her feet.

" Careful, ya gotta start from the beginning, then work up =
ta the big stuff.  First ya learn balance, and once ya got that mastered, t=
here's no stopp'n ya from kick'n Predacon tail end."

Seeing that Elita was=
 ready to begin training, Nightshift decides to teach her a very calm but b=
alance developing exercise known as Tai Chi, Cybertronian style.  He smiles=
 down to her and guides her stance, also taking the same body positions as =
her own.

" Now this exercise is real easy, and leads up ta more intense tr=
aining you'll receive later on.  It's known as Tai Chi, Chi be'n your inner=
 energy.   Learn ta harness your chi and I bet you'll have Waspinator exter=
minated in no time". 

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Au=
g 3, 2011, at 12:48 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
=


    
  Elita:

  "That would be niiiiice!!1"smiled widely ELita and she s=
tarted to kick and 
  punhing while she said "Adn if a meanie Predacon want=
s to bother my mom I'll 
  Punch him so badly that.... OPPPSSS"

  Elita sl=
ipped and fell backwards she looked embarrased at Nightshift

  -----Mensaj=
e original----- 
  From: Sandy Panico
  Sent: Tuesday, August 02, 2011 8:34=
 AM
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: MEdic Bay

  Quietly, Night=
shift gets back into robot mode and with ninja skill, he 
  sneaks up. Behi=
nd Elita and rubs her head gently.

  " Gotchya. Nice try though. "

  As h=
e interacts with her, a drop of condensation falls on his right 
  shoulder=
. He looks up to the ceiling and then back to Elita.

  " I got a neat tric=
k ta show ya. And I'm gonna teach it ta you'n your 
  folks. Now, stay righ=
t there, hold out your paws, pads up, and watch 
  carefully."

  He gently=
 positions Elita's paws, steps back with a peaceful smile on his 
  face, c=
loses his eyes, and with a tranquil breath, slides his right foot 
  across=
 the floor, starting from his left side, all the way to his right, in 
  a =
semi circle.

  Another drop of condensation collects on the ceiling and fo=
rms another ball 
  of moisture, which drips down from above. Below it, Nig=
htshift performs a 
  poetic version of Tai Chi, and while going through on=
e of the paces, the 
  water drop gently rolls down onto his arm without sp=
lattering and continues 
  to stay intact as he moves with a peaceful grace=
 and fluidity. At the end 
  of the performance, the water drop is caught o=
n the top of his hand as he 
  manages to deposit it intact, into Elita's p=
aws.

  " And there ya have it. Master Yokitron called this Inner Peace. On=
e can 
  only find inner peace within themselves once they learn how ta acc=
ept and 
  recover from the demons of their past. I'm gonna teach you guys =
so many 
  neat tricks, you're gonna make enemy heads spin clear off their =
body 
  shells."

  Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

  On Aug =
2, 2011, at 1:29 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> 
  wrote:
=

  > Nighlight/ELita:
  >
  > Nighlight came inside the Cr chamber and and =
looking to her daughter said
  > "Behave Elita and dont move away of Nights=
hift"
  >
  > "Yes mommiee"said the child with a wide smile while she was i=
n her beas 
  > mode
  >
  > Nighlight smiled and the cr closed. Elita look=
ed at Nightshift and while 
  > she
  > waved her tail shesaid with a child=
ish tone "Catch me if you can, Uncle
  > Nightshift..."
  >
  > Elita ran a=
 short distance and waited for Nightshift while she waved her
  > tiny tail=
